PositionHistory.Title: Tech Lead
Team Lead
Analyst
Designer
Sr System Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
The objective of the project "Network of Judicial Registers (NJR)" of France, Germany, Spain, Belgium, Luxembourg, the Czech Republic, Poland, Slovakia, Slovenia, Italy, and United Kingdom is to interconnect their criminal/judicial registers on electronic base and, this way, to speed up the exchange of information about offenders and to improve prosecution.
Responsibility * Analyzing BR in technical point of view, design documentation of business rules functionality, development, and coordination with Belgium onshore IBM team.
Environment : Java 1.5, JSP, Spring, Hibernate, SOA, Life ray, Jasper Reports, JavaScript, Ajax, XML, CSS, HTML, SOA, IBM RSA, IBM CC, IBM CQ, IBM MQSeries, Prism, MS Office, ITUP, UML, WinXP RequisitePro.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Transport for London (TFL) to provide the next generation congestion charging system for London. Road User Charging is an innovate offering from Managed Business Process Services (MBPS) for international road-charging market, blending skills & innovation in road charging business operations, on-board & roadside equipment, wireless communications, multiple payment channels & other value-added services.
Responsibility * Involved in High level, Low level design, POC (Proof of Concept) design, and developed set of persistent classes in the data layer for data manipulation and supported UAT. ; * Reviewed automated test plans, business scenarios, generated traceability matrix & assisted End User during script execution & maintaining the environments needed for execution.
Environment : Java 1.4, JSP, Struts,, JavaScript, Ajax, XML, CSS, HTML, SOA, IBM RSA, IBM CC, IBM CQ, IBM RST, IBM RFT, WinXP, Prism, MS Office, ITUP, RequisitePro.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Time Web Log Capture & Measurement- Web analytics provides organizations with actionable, real-time intelligence regarding their online strategies & marketing initiatives. Web analytics product helps organizations quickly identify & understand the most profitable paths through their Portals or Web sites, where visitors are dropping off, what's driving critical success events, & how different Segments of visitors interact with the Web site, & real-time monitoring of a site's KPIs. Responsibility * Involved in High level, Low level design, POC (Proof of Concept) design, and developed set of persistent classes in the data layer for data manipulation and supported UAT.
Environment : Java 1.4, JSP, Servlet, Struts 1.2, JDBC, XML, Dojo1.0.2, Fusion chart v3, AJAX, JavaScript, HTML, Oracle 8i, IBM RSA, Exadel Studio 4.5, Windows 2003

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
To meliorate the existing 24x7 Bank Billing service, payment & presentment. The web application bringing the bills to desktop saving time & money the Software module is named, EBBP-IX that consolidates bills from multiple billers at a single online location, manages the complete Electronic Billing, Recurring Payments & Remittances services as major Functions.
Responsibility * Interacting with functional consultant, development, documentation. Environment: Java 1.4, JSP, Servlet, JDBC, MVC, Oracle 8i, Tomcat, Eclipse, Win2000

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
MMIS (Medical Management Information System, CWM, UK) Health Care [ The MMIS project involves porting the existing .NET based Interchange system to a JEE Framework that is functionally equivalent to the original .NET application. Worked on Claims & Encounters, Drug Rebate, Financial Services, Utilization Management module
Responsibility * Interacting with functional consultant, development, implementation, documentation. ; * UI development, testing, & support.
Environment: Jsp, JavaScript, HTML, DHTML, CSS, MS Front Page Editor, Adobe Photoshop, Win2003.
PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATION * Masters of Science in Computer Applications, New Delhi India. ;

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rohit Kunder has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 12 years. Currently he is employed as a Tech Lead. Rohit has extensive knowledge of IBM Hardware, Struts Web Application Framework, Java, AJAX, XML, JavaScript, Java Server Pages, HTML, Web Services, UML/OMT, Service Oriented Architecture, Rational RequisitePro, Prism, Microsoft Office, JSON, Hibernate, Cascading Style Sheets, MVC, Java Servlets, DOJO, Spring Framework, JDBC, ITUP, ECLiPSe, jQuery, WebSphere MQ, UNIX, Oracle 10G, Microsoft Visio, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, IBM CQ, GUI Applications, XML Schema, Oracle 8i, Microsoft .NET Technology, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, XSLT, TCP/IP, INSP, Fusion, Data Access Object, DHTML, CSP, BRR Tool, Adobe Photoshop. Rohit has an extensive management experience (3.7 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Currently since 2013-06 the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Tech Lead/Analyst. Since 2010-08 for 31 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Team Lead/Analyst at INSP (Confidential).
